name: Ravenfolk Doom Croaker
description: A medium humanoid creature clad in studded leather armor, known for its darkly mystical abilities and manipulative nature.
memorable: It can instill fear through prophetic caws while wielding rune-powered weapons that deal radiant damage.
goals: The Ravenfolk Doom Croaker usually aims to deceive enemies, invoke fear, and support allies using its magic and intimidation.
relations: It may be found among other ravenfolk or allied with creatures that thrive in darker, mystical circumstances.
environment: Typically found in dark, mystical locations or shadowy forests.
strengths: Possesses magical resistance, enhancing its ability to withstand spells.
weaknesses: Average physical strength, relying more on magic and manipulation than brute force.
attacks: Utilizes Multiattack, combining peck and runestaff attacks or unleashing radiant damage through runeblast.
most_powerful_ability: Prophetic Caw, making nearby creatures frightened or granting them advantages based on their responses to the prophecy.
equipment: wields a Runestaff and has innate magical abilities.
senses: Has exceptional passive perception of 20, making it adept at detecting threats.
skills: Excels in Deception, Intimidation, and has impressive Perception skills.
additional_information: Can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices.
Rune-powered weapons deal additional radiant damage.
Can cast augury and the thaumaturgy cantrip at will.
Uses clever tactics to manipulate outcomes in combat.
spellcasting: Can cast augury and the thaumaturgy cantrip using Wisdom without material components.
test_queries: humanoid that can mimic animal sounds
